title: Implicit differentiation: curve with chord part - a

content.description: Consider the curve y2=4+x and chord AB joining the points A(âˆ’4,0) and B(0,2) on the curve.
content.question: Find the x- and y-coordinates of the point on the curve where the tangent line is parallel to chord AB.

frqParts.text: Find the x- and y-coordinates of the point on the curve where the tangent line is parallel to chord AB.

topic.text: 2.2: Defining the Derivative of a Function and Using Derivative Notation

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Identify an appropriate mathematical rule or procedure based on the relationship between concepts (e.g., rate of change and accumulation) or processes (e.g., differentiation and its inverse process, anti-differentiation) to solve problems.
